job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pstrongRolestrong Site Reliability Engineer SREppbrppAn award winningnbspFortune 50 Energy Company striving towards cleaner energy solutions is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a contract to hire basis The Site Reliability Engineer will be responsible for the upkeep and improvement of DSX production systems The contract will be 6  12 months with the likelihood of becoming a full time roleppbrppstrongRoleResponsibilitiesstrongpulliSupport Service EngineersliliUpkeep and improve existing infrastructure and documentationliliInfrastructure AutomationliliImprove upon Prometheus MonitoringliliDeploy new versions of DSXliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulli3 Years Experience in a similar role preferredliliBachelors DegreeliliFamiliarity with Linux Unix Shell GithubliliTools Nginx Docker Kubernetes or TerraformliliLanguages Nodejs Python Go NET or RubyliulpbrppstrongCompensation and BenefitsstrongppThe rate for this role isnbsp7095 phnbspwith some flexibility for exceptional circumstances We also offernbspmedical contributionsnbspup to 75 ampnbsp401k plansppbrppNo C2C candidatesppMust be eligible to work in TXppbrppCould this be of interest to you at this time If so please apply with an updated copy of your resume and feel free to followup with a call at 9295214926p
